N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 158.4 - Exemptions

State Regulations

The following are deemed to be other than vehicles being
operated on a public highway for the transportation of earth, sand, stone, or
similar loose substances: (a) Vehicles
directly crossing a highway at, or approximately at, right angles; (b) Vehicles used in the construction, reconstruction or repair of a highway when at the site, or within the contract
limits (as defined in the designation of a restricted highway) of, such
construction, reconstruction or repair activity; (c) Vehicles used for applying abrasives or
chemicals for snow and ice control on a public highway while such vehicles are
actually engaged in such operation or traveling to a particular location for
such purpose. Notes
